5#ifndef V8_HEAP_GC_TRACER_INL_H_
6#define V8_HEAP_GC_TRACER_INL_H_

8#include "src/base/logging.h"
9#include "src/base/platform/platform.h"
10#include "src/execution/isolate.h"
11#include "src/heap/gc-tracer.h"
12#include "src/heap/heap-inl.h"

14namespace v8 {
15namespace internal {
16
17constexpr GCTracer::IncrementalInfos& GCTracer::IncrementalInfos::operator+=(
18 base::TimeDelta delta) {
19 steps++;
20 duration += delta;
21 if (delta > longest_step) {
22 longest_step = delta;
23 }
24 return *this;
25}
26
27GCTracer::Scope::Scope(GCTracer* tracer, ScopeId scope, ThreadKind thread_kind)
28 : tracer_(tracer),
29 scope_(scope),
30 thread_kind_(thread_kind),
31 start_time_(base::TimeTicks::Now()) {
32 DCHECK_IMPLIES(thread_kind_ == ThreadKind::kMain,
33 tracer_->heap_->IsMainThread());
34
35#ifdef V8_RUNTIME_CALL_STATS
36 if (V8_LIKELY(!TracingFlags::is_runtime_stats_enabled())) return;
37 if (thread_kind_ == ThreadKind::kMain) {
38 runtime_stats_ = tracer_->heap_->isolate_->counters()->runtime_call_stats();
39 runtime_stats_->Enter(&timer_, GCTracer::RCSCounterFromScope(scope));
40 } else {
41 runtime_call_stats_scope_.emplace(
42 tracer->worker_thread_runtime_call_stats());
43 runtime_stats_ = runtime_call_stats_scope_->Get();
44 runtime_stats_->Enter(&timer_, GCTracer::RCSCounterFromScope(scope));
45 }
46#endif // defined(V8_RUNTIME_CALL_STATS)
47}
48
49GCTracer::Scope::~Scope() {
50 const base::TimeDelta duration = base::TimeTicks::Now() - start_time_;
51 tracer_->AddScopeSample(scope_, duration);
52
53 if (thread_kind_ == ThreadKind::kMain) {
54 if (scope_ == ScopeId::MC_INCREMENTAL ||
55 scope_ == ScopeId::MC_INCREMENTAL_START ||
56 scope_ == ScopeId::MC_INCREMENTAL_FINALIZE) {
57 auto* long_task_stats =
58 tracer_->heap_->isolate_->GetCurrentLongTaskStats();
59 long_task_stats->gc_full_incremental_wall_clock_duration_us +=
60 duration.InMicroseconds();
61 }
62 }
63
64#ifdef V8_RUNTIME_CALL_STATS
65 if (V8_LIKELY(runtime_stats_ == nullptr)) return;
66 runtime_stats_->Leave(&timer_);
67#endif // defined(V8_RUNTIME_CALL_STATS)
68}
69
70constexpr const char* GCTracer::Scope::Name(ScopeId id) {
71#define CASE(scope) \
72 case Scope::scope: \
73 return "V8.GC_" #scope;
74 switch (id) {
75 TRACER_SCOPES(CASE)
76 TRACER_BACKGROUND_SCOPES(CASE)
77 default:
78 return nullptr;
79 }
80#undef CASE
81}
82
83constexpr bool GCTracer::Scope::NeedsYoungEpoch(ScopeId id) {
84#define CASE(scope) \
85 case Scope::scope: \
86 return true;
87 switch (id) {
88 TRACER_YOUNG_EPOCH_SCOPES(CASE)
89 default:
90 return false;
91 }
92#undef CASE
93}
94
95constexpr int GCTracer::Scope::IncrementalOffset(ScopeId id) {
96 DCHECK_LE(FIRST_INCREMENTAL_SCOPE, id);
97 DCHECK_GE(LAST_INCREMENTAL_SCOPE, id);
98 return id - FIRST_INCREMENTAL_SCOPE;
99}
100
101constexpr bool GCTracer::Event::IsYoungGenerationEvent(Type type) {
102 DCHECK_NE(Type::START, type);
103 return type == Type::SCAVENGER || type == Type::MINOR_MARK_SWEEPER ||
104 type == Type::INCREMENTAL_MINOR_MARK_SWEEPER;
105}
106
107CollectionEpoch GCTracer::CurrentEpoch(Scope::ScopeId id) const {
108 return Scope::NeedsYoungEpoch(id) ? epoch_young_ : epoch_full_;
109}
110
111double GCTracer::current_scope(Scope::ScopeId id) const {
112 DCHECK_GT(Scope::NUMBER_OF_SCOPES, id);
113 return current_.scopes[id].InMillisecondsF();
114}
115
116constexpr const GCTracer::IncrementalInfos& GCTracer::incremental_scope(
117 Scope::ScopeId id) const {
118 return incremental_scopes_[Scope::IncrementalOffset(id)];
119}
120
121void GCTracer::AddScopeSample(Scope::ScopeId id, base::TimeDelta duration) {
122 if (Scope::FIRST_INCREMENTAL_SCOPE <= id &&
123 id <= Scope::LAST_INCREMENTAL_SCOPE) {
124 incremental_scopes_[Scope::IncrementalOffset(id)] += duration;
125 } else if (Scope::FIRST_BACKGROUND_SCOPE <= id &&
126 id <= Scope::LAST_BACKGROUND_SCOPE) {
127 base::MutexGuard guard(&background_scopes_mutex_);
128 background_scopes_[id] += duration;
129 } else {
130 DCHECK_GT(Scope::NUMBER_OF_SCOPES, id);
131 current_.scopes[id] += duration;
132 }
133}
134
135#ifdef V8_RUNTIME_CALL_STATS
136WorkerThreadRuntimeCallStats* GCTracer::worker_thread_runtime_call_stats() {
137 return heap_->isolate_->counters()->worker_thread_runtime_call_stats();
138}
139
140RuntimeCallCounterId GCTracer::RCSCounterFromScope(Scope::ScopeId id) {
141 static_assert(Scope::FIRST_SCOPE == Scope::MC_INCREMENTAL);
142 return static_cast<RuntimeCallCounterId>(
143 static_cast<int>(RuntimeCallCounterId::kGC_MC_INCREMENTAL) +
144 static_cast<int>(id));
145}
146#endif // defined(V8_RUNTIME_CALL_STATS)
147
148} // namespace internal
149} // namespace v8
